title: Sip & Savor
description:
Join us for "Sip and Savor" at Whispering Vine Wine Co. on August 28, 2024, from 5:30 PM - 8:00 PM. This exclusive event features a curated selection of exceptional wines paired with a custom food menu designed to delight your palate. This is NOT a sit down event. Small plates will be passed in a cocktail-style party.

Enjoy a range of top-tier wines:
- Caymus Cabernet Sauvignon
- Justin Isosceles
- Convene By Dan Kosta Pinot Noir
- Belle Glos Eulenloch Pinot Noir
- Robert Biale Vineyards Black Chicken Zinfandel
- Penfolds Bin 389
- Hall Napa Valley Merlot
- Quintessa Illumination Sauvignon Blanc
- Perrier-Jouet Grand Brut
- Whispering Vine RosÃ©

Alongside gourmet dishes:
Bluefin Ahi Tuna Cups
- Sesame, Soy, Crispy Ginger
Watermelon Salad
- Mint, Feta, Cherry Tomato, Lemongrass Vinaigrette
Bao Buns
- Crispy Pork Belly, Hoisin, Housemade Spicy Pickle, Shittake
Seared Japanese Dayboat Scallop
- Israeli Couscous Salad, Chardonnay Lemon Buerre Blanc
Wild Mushroom Ravioli
- Veal, Mushroom Demi Glaze
Stracciatella Ice Cream Sandwiches
- White Chocolate, Macadamia Cookies

At $95 per person (tax and tip included), with space limited to 50 guests, this is a must-attend evening of indulgence and flavor. Reserve your spot now for an unforgettable experience!

title: Flights and Flatbread
description: Join us for an enjoyable wine tasting event from 4:00 to 8:00 PM. Savor a curated flight of exceptional wines from Educated Guess paired with a gourmet flatbread for $25. Itâ€™s a relaxed evening of delightful flavors and great company. We look forward to seeing you!
